title: Planet earth: magnetic force
creator_credit: National Academy of Sciences (U.S.) and Lothar Wolff
brief_description: Using animation and time-lapse photography this film demonstrates how the geophysicist, using modern instruments, aeroplanes and rockets, studies, measures and maps the earth’s magnetic fields and observes the effects of sun spots and the associated auroras. Includes excellent footage of magnetic storms.
